overview: Ashlynn and her friends are ready to take their vacation to the beach, but their plans get twisted when the van breaks down in “Ghost Canyon.” Little do they know that this town is haunted by ghosts! However, these ghosts aren’t just scary… they’re horny! So watch the girls take matters into their own hands as they turn this ghost town into a stomping ground of pussy and pleasure!
title: Ashlynn Goes to College 4
